sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './EventStructure.scss' function EventStructure({ event, date, organizer, tags, description, attendButtonClick, zoom, img, notAttendButtonClick }) { const eventDate = new Date(date.timestamp) return (

Event: {event}

Date and time: date {eventDate.toLocaleDateString("")}

Created by: {organizer}

Tags: {tags}

Description: {description}

Zoom Channel: {zoom}

) } export default EventStructure
